oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The emergence of technology in organic agriculture in Cyprus
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Adamides, Mr George
Savvides, Mr Savvas
Biberian, Ms Natalie
Giannakopoulou, Ms Marianthi
Georgiadou, Ms Eirini
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Organic Agriculture has taken a dynamic position within the market due to fundamental changes in consumersâ€™ demands and preferences. In the meantime Information and Communication Technologies (ICT) are growing swiftly and penetrating more in depth in the world of organic agriculture. In this pa-per we will analyze the development of organic agriculture in Cyprus along with the penetration of ICT in organic agriculture
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Adamides, Mr George; Savvides, Mr Savvas; Biberian, Ms Natalie; Giannakopoulou, Ms Marianthi and Georgiadou, Ms Eirini (2006) The emergence of technology in organic agriculture in Cyprus. Poster at: Joint Organic Congress, Odense, Denmark, May 30-31, 2006.
